name: The 5 Second Rule
description:
Play as Terry, an hyperqualified (and minuscule) agent in charge of keeping your fallen food nice and clean while you bend down to pick it up, and end with the hordes of microorganisms that will try to contaminate your meal.

The game started as a template from AlienApproach, fron Stencyl. However, all assets, UI, actors, audio, backgrounds and new features were made by me.

-Naxinix
